title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
summary: Tiny changes, remarkable results. Practical strategies to form good habits, break bad ones, and master the tiny behaviors that lead to extraordinary outcomes.

title: Man's Search for Meaning
author: Viktor E. Frankl
summary: A psychiatrist's memoir of life in Nazi death camps and lessons for spiritual survival and finding meaning.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
summary: A shepherd's journey to follow his personal legend — a tale about listening to your heart and recognizing opportunity.

title: Thinking
author: Fast and Slow
column5: A tour of the mind and two systems that drive the way we think: fast intuitive thinking and slow rational analysis.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
summary: A guide to spiritual enlightenment: living in the present moment and escaping the tyranny of the mind.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
summary: Epic tale of politics, religion and ecology on the desert planet Arrakis—deep world-building and questions of power and destiny.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
summary: Rules for focused success in a distracted world: cultivating depth of focus and producing at high levels.

title: Quiet
author: Susan Cain
summary: An exploration of the strengths of introverts in a world that can't stop talking — insights on solitude, creativity and quiet leadership.
